title: Emerald Grandeur: Contemporary Leaf Haaram
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for an enduring luster.
features: A modern take on the traditional Haaram, this necklace showcases a graceful leaf motif intricately designed with shimmering CZs. Pear-shaped emeralds are bezel set within each leaf, creating a harmonious blend of nature and elegance. The openwork design gives it a light and airy feel, while maintaining a statement presence.
colors: Vibrant Emerald Green complemented by the radiant Yellow Gold and sparkling White CZ stones.
occasions: and festive gatherings. Also suitable for upscale parties and celebrations where you want to make a sophisticated statement. Wear it to a Seemantham (శ్రీమంతం) or Half-Saree function for a touch of contemporary grace.
description: This is not just a necklace; it's a modern heirloom. The exquisite emeralds and shimmering CZs are carefully selected for their brilliance. The contemporary leaf design, combined with traditional craftsmanship, ensures you stand out with unparalleled style. Offers a touch of modern elegance while staying true to our South Indian heritage.
